sentence.Network_en: I was sent to boarding school, where I spent six years of unremitting misery.
sentence.Network_cn: 我被送到寄宿学校呆了6年，其间我的生活一直很悲惨。

sentence.Network_en: He watched her with unremitting attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直全神贯注地注视着她。

sentence.Network_en: He represented a people who had prevailed by unremitting tenacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他代表一个以坚韧不拔的意志取胜的民族.

entry.tran: 未停止的；未减弱的；不懈的
entry.def: Something that is unremitting continues without stopping or becoming less intense.

example.ex: I was sent to boarding school, where I spent six years of unremitting misery...
example.tran: 我被送到寄宿学校呆了6年，其间我的生活一直很悲惨。

example.ex: He watched her with unremitting attention.
example.tran: 他一直全神贯注地注视着她。

means.word_mean: 1. uninterrupted in time and indefinitely long continuing;

sentences.sentence: "night and day we live with the incessant noise of the city"
"the perpetual struggle to maintain standards in a democracy"
"man's unceasing warfare with drought and isolation"

auth_sentence.content: The Spain striker has endured a year of unremitting descent.

auth_sentence.content: But there are times when this unremitting gloom tips over into self-parody.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there are times when this unremitting gloom tips over into self-parody.

auth_sentence.content: What education I do have is mostly the result of constant and unremitting self-education.
